*********************************************************************************
****             Hemispheric Temperature Anomalies (Land + Ocean)
****                              (1880-2014)
****
****     Source: R. Ruedy,* M. Sato,** and K. Lo*
****
****    *Trinnovim LLC
****     NASA Goddard Institute for Space Studies
****     New York, NY
****   **Columbia University
****     NASA Goddard Institute for Space Studies
****     New York, NY
****
**********************************************************************************

Global annual temperature anomalies (degrees C) for the
northern and southern hemispheres computed using land and ocean data,
1880-2014.
Anomalies are relative to the 1951-1980 base period means.

Non-computed values are indicated by "-99.99".

----------------------------------
           Annual Anomalies
                    (5-yr means)
Year  N Hem. S Hem. N Hem. S. Hem.
------------------|---------------
1880  -0.33  -0.09 -99.99 -99.99 
1881  -0.22  -0.03 -99.99 -99.99

1883  -0.29  -0.08  -0.30  -0.09
